name: softy
content:
softy noun [C]
(KIND PERSON)
Add to word list
Add to word list
a person who is emotional and kind : big softy Some people were scared of him, but he was a big softy at heart. She's tough mentally and physically, but a real softy on the inside. While racing, he was aggressive and determined, but off the track he was an old softie. Synonym
soft-hearted
More examplesFewer examplesSentimental softy that I am, I wiped a few tears from my eyes.

softy noun [C]
(WEAK PERSON)
often disapproving a person who does not have the physical or mental strength to do something that might be difficult : With the physical strength it demands, ballet is not for softies. Softies are even allowed to wear wetsuits for the swim challenge. He is too much of a softie to fire anyone.
